title: Adding and Subtracting Matrices
body: Use the matrices below to perform the indicated operation if possible. $$A=\begin{bmatrix} 2 & -5 \\ 6 & 7 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$B=\begin{bmatrix} -9 & 6 \\ -4 & 2 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$C=\begin{bmatrix} 0 & 9 \\ 7 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$D=\begin{bmatrix} -8 & 7 & -5 \\ 4 & 3 & 2 \\ 0 & 9 & 2 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$E=\begin{bmatrix} 4 & 5 & 3 \\ 7 & -6 & -5 \\ 1 & 0 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$$
